item.title: Disney Mismatched Stud Earrings, Mickey and Minnie Mouse, Donald and Daisy Duck, Silver Plated
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Adorable Disney Mismatched Stud Earrings, inspired by the most beloved animated couples, are sure to add a bright spot to any day or outfit. Mickey & Minnie Mouse and Donald & Daisy Duck create fun mismatched earring pairs fans are sure to love, exceptionally crafted in striking silver plated or ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $99.97 - $20.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 13:28:31 UTC – Details)


Adorable Disney Mismatched Stud Earrings, inspired by the most beloved animated couples, are sure to add a bright spot to any day or outfit. Mickey & Minnie Mouse and Donald & Daisy Duck create fun mismatched earring pairs fans are sure to love, exceptionally crafted in striking silver plated or gold plated finishes with crisp colors. Celebrate these classic characters with super style! Makes a wonderful gift, a beautiful way to show your love, or a neat addition to your own Disney jewelry collection.

Silver plated; gold plated (see style for details); Mickey/Minnie: 0.30″ l x 0.20″ w; Donald/Daisy: 0.537″ l x 0.374″ w; notched ear post; butterfly nut back. Arrives in an authentic Disney gift box.

Officially licensed Disney jewelry from SallyRose pleases generations young and old with timeless, quality, handcrafted designs.
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ November 4, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Jacmel
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0B8M2BVTC

The Perfect Pair: Instantly recognizable icons are decorated with each character’s signature outfits; Minnie’s with a red bow and polka dot dress, and Mickey’s with his classic red shorts
Superb Silver Plating: Exquisitely crafted stud earrings feature a sleek silver plated finish and crisp, colorful details
Ready to Gift: Delivered in an authentic Disney gift box, the sweet stud earrings make the perfect present for Valentine’s Day, anniversaries, bridesmaids, bridal showers, birthdays, graduations, Christmas, Mother’s Day, Easter, or any occasion
Dedicated to Quality & Style: Founded in 1977, New York-based SallyRose, a premier designer and curator of cross-generational and timeless brands, offers an array of affordable, yet always finely crafted on-trend and classic jewelry as well as gift items for the entire family

16GB Ram Memory; handle multiple tasks smoothly, 256GB SSD storage; provides ample storage for your files

Easy integration;Help get the most out of existing IT investments with legacy feature support available on the The Elitedesk 800 G3 like DP ports, a VGA port, an RJ-45 connection. Support multi display.

This Dell OptiPlex 9020 desktop computer won’t take up much space on your desktop, yet it still contains powerful hardware to keep you productive, including a fast processor for multitasking and a variety of ports for connecting peripherals.

Specifications: Processor: Intel Core i7 4770 3.4GHz Graphics: Integrated Intel HD Memory: 32GB DDR3 Hard Drive: 1TB SSDOperating System: Windows 10 Pro 64 Bit – Multi-language supports English/Spanish/FrenchPorts: 4 External USB 3.0 ports (2 front, 2 rear) and 6 External USB 2.0 ports (2 front, 4 rear); 1 RJ-45; 1 Serial; 1 VGA; 2 DisplayPort; 2 PS/2; 2 Line-in (stereo/microphone), 2 Line-out (headphone/speaker)Included in the box Computer; Power Cord; USB Keyboard; USB Mouse.

POWERFUL PROCESSOR – Configured with top of the line series processor for lightning fast, reliable and consistent performance to ensure an exceptional PC experience.
SUPERIOR STORAGE AND MEMORY – Customized with 1TB SSD storage space to store apps, games, photos, music and movies. Loaded with DELLGB of RAM to zip through multiple tasks in a hurry without lag.
WiFi CONNECTIVITY – Stay connected to the WiFi Adapter. Play your favorite music files with stereo sound. Easily connect to large and multiple monitors through the installed onboard video connections.
WINDOWS 10 LATEST RELEASE – A new installation of the latest Microsoft Windows 10 Professional 64 Bit Operating System software, free of bloatware commonly installed from other manufacturers. As Microsoft’s latest and best OS to date, Windows 10 Professional 64 Bit will maximize the utility of each PC for years to come. Optional software such as Anti-Virus and Office 365 can also be easily downloaded through the Microsoft Windows App Store.
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE – All Amazon Renewed computers come with a 90-day warranty and technical support to provide customers with unmatched quality and care.

DELL 7050MT is a Mini Tower computer. This device is easy to upgrade with additional RAM and storage but have little to no expandability. Usually models with this chassis have an optional Wi-Fi and Bluetooth module and an M.2 slot for an SSD.
Features: 

CPU: Intel Quad Core i7-7700 3.60GHz to 4.20GHz, 4 cores, 8 threads
CPU Cache: 8 MB

Operating system: Windows 10 Pro

Memory: 32GB DDR4

Hard Drive: New 1TB NVMe SSD + 2TB HDD

Video Card: N/A

USB 3.0 Ports: 6
USB 2.0 Ports: 4

Display Port: 2

VGA Port: 0

HDMI: 1

Ethernet: x1 Lan Port

Serial Port: 0

WIFI &Bluetooth:Built-in WIFI & Bluetooth

Mouse/Keyboard:Wireless Keyboard & Mouse
What’s Included:
1 x DELL 7050 Tower Desktop
1 x Brand New Wireless Keyboard Mouse Combo
1 x Power Cord
Powerful 7th Gen Processor – The DELL 7050 Tower computer driven by the Intel Core 7th Generation i7-7700 Processor (4 Core, 8 Threads, 8MB, 3.60GHz, Up to 4.20GHz) enables increased power and productivity.
Microsoft Windows 10 Pro – This DELL Tower Computer Pre-installed with the Windows 10 Professional operating system.
Superior memory – Create a full featured and smoother experience with powerful processors, Oversized 32GB DDR4 memory with Strictly selected particles.
Brand New 1TB M.2 NVMe Solid State Drive – The DELL 7050 Tower Computer comes with Brand New 1TB M.2 NVMe SSD to store important files and applications, support more faster Boot speed and faster storage rates.
Video Ports – This DELL 7050 Tower comes with 6x USB 3.0, 4x USB 2.0, 2 x display ports. Wireless keyboard & mouse are included.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $1,073.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:02:29 UTC – Details)


The stunningly beautiful ASUS AiO M3700 all-in-one PC has a 27-inch FHD LED display with a near-invisible 3 mm display bezel that gives you edge-to-edge visuals and an incredible 91% screen-to-body ratio. Combined with its advanced ASUS SonicMaster audio — featuring a DTS Audio Processing bass-reflex speaker system and two-way AI-powered noise canceling — M3700 immerses you in amazing visuals and superb sound for the ultimate entertainment experience. ASUS AiO; Ryzen 7 AiO, AMD AiO, pre-built, AiO
27” FHD multi-touch Touchscreen WideView NanoEdge Display
ASUS Wired Keyboard and Mouse included
AMD Ryzen 7 5700U Processor
Windows 11 Home
16GB DDR4 RAM and 512 PCIe SSD Storage

ASUS AiO M3700 features an AMD Ryzen 7 processor for uncompromising performance. The 27-inch multi-touch display has 100% sRGB color gamut and 178˚ wide-view technology for truly great visuals.
